AdditionalFields.Value: Regulatory Science and Policy,Science and Health Policy,Survivorship,Cancer Disparities

Description: The SARS-CoV-2 pandemic has dramatically made the scientific community aware of the public need to understand and trust the fruits of science.  Considering this societal challenge, the AACR formed the Trust in Science Task Force to catalyze efforts to build trust in science.  This Forum will include presentations and a panel discussion from the Trust in Science Task Force.  The overarching message is that the AACR is committed to creating an ecosystem of shared value through collective impact that aims to improve cancer research and care by developing policies and practices that promote societal trust in science and cultivates diversity as an Ethos of the AACR.
Title: Trust in Science
